name: Cousbians: Are They Cousins or Lesbians?
name_original: Cousbians: Are They Cousins or Lesbians?
description:
Disclaimer: Not a game about incest. No incest in game. Not all characters are lesbians (some are bisexual), but  in w|w romantic relationships. Not all characters are women (some don't have a gender), but use she/her pronouns.

Game is inspired by frustration of LGBTQ+ erasure in 1990s English dub of Sailor Moon

Includes: memes, lesbians, kazoo noise, bad color schemes

Controls:

  • Point and click with left mouse button
  • 'R' to restart back at Title Screen (if not on the ending screen)
  • 'ESC' to escape (if game was downloaded)
Link to full Credits page
Also there are more lesbians in anime and cartoons than what's in this game. I do not have the time to put in them all in.
